Name: ADX Tools
Description: The CRI Middleware ADX SDK allow you to handle AHX and ADX files. This is the official SDK. Tested with Shenmue II and works fine. Windows binaries only.

Name: ADX Tools
Description: The CRI Middleware ADX SDK allow you to handle AHX and ADX files. This is the official SDK. Not tested with any Shenmue episode. Windows and GNU/Linux binaries included.

Name: ADXUtil
Description: This program can handle AFS and ADX files.

Name: AFS2WAV
Description: AFS2WAV is a AFS to WAV converter. It's a GUI of the ADXUtil tool from Verdi Kasugano.

Name: AFS Explorer
Description: Allow you to patch AFS file much faster than AFS Utils but have some limitation if the patched file is too big.

Name: AFS Packer
Description: AFS Packer can extract the files of an AFS archive to a folder, or generate a new AFS archive with the files inside a folder. The AFS format is used in many games. Many of them from Sega. Console version only. Requires .NET Framework v3.5.

Name: AM2 DTPK sound driver extractor
Description: Extract the AM2 DTPK sound driver. Requires Python framework.

Name: BinHack 32bits Clone
Description: This is a 32bits BINHACK clone, designed to hack the IP.BIN bootstrap and the 1ST_READ.BIN Dreamcast binary. Windows and Linux binaries and complete source code included.

Name: Dark Falaz Tools Kit
Description: Various Dreamcast tools made by Dark Falaz.

Name: DEmul Emulator
Description: Another great Dreamcast Emulator, which supports Shenmue very well. You'll need a Dreamcast BIOS in order to run it (Don't ask here for this).

Name: Dream Explorer
Description: VMU Tool (a.k.a Dream Explorer) is an application for the Dreamcast that allows you to explore the content of your VMU, PC, and CD/GD, and open their files in the numerous bundled tools. Full Selfboot DiscJuggler image with ~5000 saves included.

Name: DTPK driver data extractor
Description: Extract DTPK driver data. Requires Python framework.

Name: DTPK to DSF converter
Description: Converts AMD2 DTPK sound format to DSF. Requires Python framework.

Name: GDI Explorer
Description: GDI Explorer is a small tool that enables you to extract data from *.gdi files. Requires .NET Framework v3.5.

Name: Humans Dissecter
Description: Extract every sections of a PAKS file contained in the HUMANS.AFS archive.

Name: Kakuzawa Tools
Description: Contains 3 tools made by Kakuzawa: a save editor, a file swapper and a snapshots extractor (for the Xbox). Requires J2SE Runtime.

Name: MAPINFO.BIN Patcher
Description: Quickly patch a map information file with data from other map information file, for map switching.

Name: nullDC Emulator
Description: Official release of the nullDC Dreamcast Emulator. You'll need a Dreamcast BIOS in order to run it (Don't ask here for this).

Name: nullDC Emulator
Description:
Lastest official release of the nullDC Dreamcast Emulator.
You still need a Dreamcast BIOS in order to run it (Don't ask here for this, again). Untested version with Shenmue, but should work.

Name: nullDC Emulator (Source)
Description: C/C++ source code of the nullDC Dreamcast Emulator. Dumped from the SVN on 2010-05-19.

Name: Makaron Emulator
Description: This package contains all released version of the Makaron emulator, from T8 WIP to T12/5, which is the latest in date.

Name: MT5 Extraction Tools
Description: This is the yazgoo tools pack containing a 3D meshes models extractor from MT5 files.

Name: NVIDIA Photoshop Plug-ins
Description: This is a plug-ins pack containing a DirectDraw Surface (DDS) converter plug-in for Adobe Photoshop.

Name: PVR to PNG
Description: Convert any PowerVR texture to the PNG format. This tool keep the alpha-channel.

Name: PVR Dissector
Description: Extract every PowerVR texture from generic game datas.

Name: PVR-X to PNG
Description: Convert any PVR-X (DirectDraw Surface embedded in PowerVR texture) to the PNG format. This tool keep the alpha-channel. Source is available on the Shenmue Translation Pack SVN.

Name: Sega PVR Tools
Description: This package contains every tools made by Sega to handle Dreamcast PVR textures files.

Name: Sega Stream Extractor
Description: Extract Stream from generic game datas.

Name: Selfboot Data/Data Pack
Description: This pack allows you to create auto-boot CD-R images for your Dreamcast. With this environement, you don't have to use LBA-based hacks on your Dreamcast game boot-files. This version of the pack is compatible under every known Windows environements, including Windows 7 x64.

Name: Shenmue 2X Modified Maps
Description: This package made by Kakuzawa contains some hacked maps for Shenmue 2X.

Name: SND2WAV
Description: This package was done to decode Shenmue II SND files to RIFF Wave files.

Name: Tile Molester
Description: Tile Molester is the next generation of tile editors. It has compatibility for many systems. It requires at least version 1.4.2 of J2SE. Source code is included.

Name: Universal AFS Extractor
Description: Extract files from AFS.

Name: Universal PVR Extractor
Description: Extract every PVR from generic game datas.

Name: VMU Explorer
Description: This program allows you to open VMU dumps made with VMU Tool - Dream Explorer (.VMU, .DCM) or a Dreamcast Emulator (VMS.BIN). It supports raw VMU dumps as well as Nexus cards dumps.

Name: VMU TOOL PC
Description: VMU TOOL PC is a cool Windows-Like explorer which allows you to manage Dreamcast's saves on your PC.
